original_text: And the head of Ephraim is Samaria, and the head of Samaria is Remaliah's son. If ye will not believe, surely ye shall not be established.
korean_text: 에브라임의 머리는 사마리아요 사마리아의 머리는 르말리야의 아들이니라 만일 너희가 굳게 믿지 아니하면 너희는 굳게 서지 못하리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: And the head of Ephraim is Samaria,
and the head of Samaria is Remaliah's son.
surely ye shall not be established.
